protocol_name: Protocol for the isolation of non-parenchymal liver cells from human liver biopsies (1-2cm3)
protocol_name_html: Protocol for the isolation of non-parenchymal liver cells from human liver biopsies (1-2cm3)
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5ulrj","text":"Optimised protocol for the isolation of non-parenchymal cells from human liver biopsies. Used on 1-2cm3 biopsies. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
protocol_affiliation: VIB-UGent Center for Inflammation Research, Ghent, Belgium

authors_list.name: Charlotte Scott

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"fs7ni","text":"Process tissue ASAP after removal from patient to avoid excessive cell death.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
status_info: We use this protocol currently in our group for single cell analysis and a more thorough flow cytometric analysis of human liver non-parenchymal cells with our main emphasis being on mononuclear phagocytes (Kupffer cells, macrophages, monocytes and Dendritic cells).

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"3hl8b","text":"Put in shaking water bath at  for  5 \u2013 shake vigorously every   by hand","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":29,"length":1,"key":0},{"offset":34,"length":1,"key":1},{"offset":62,"length":1,"key":2}],"data":[]},{"key":"ba2hd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cal67","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"27mff","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"D3E5D700E68E11E889311500966986F6","temperature":"37","unit":10,"label":"","step_guid":"4F191060E68D11E8A4E835C85185F1D1"}},{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"D9099AF0E68E11E889311500966986F6","duration":1200,"label":"","step_guid":"4F191060E68D11E8A4E835C85185F1D1"}},{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"E00C3100E68E11E889311500966986F6","duration":300,"label":"","step_guid":"4F191060E68D11E8A4E835C85185F1D1"}}],"guid":"4F191060E68D11E8A4E835C85185F1D1","id":682214,"previous_id":682213,"previous_guid":"4F18E950E68D11E8A4E835C85185F1D1","section":"Dissociation"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"87aq1","text":"Filter through 40um filter and put on plate\/in tube for staining","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"4F97DD50E68D11E8A4E835C85185F1D1","id":682221,"previous_id":682229,"previous_guid":"7A39A4B0E68F11E8BD6FAFA1D3C4F3B9","section":"Dissociation"}
